doc: Olive Crashes When Right Arrow One Frame on Subsequence
*If you are requesting a feature, you can remove the following content. If not, it would help get a faster feedback on your issue.*
Olive Crashes when I use the right arrow key to move one frame into a subsequence on my main timeline. In the subsequence, there are some PNGs with transform effects animated one them.
2.  Click on the beginning of subsequence with animated pngs
